title: KPIT posts 44.7% YoY PAT growth for Q2 FY25, marking 17th consecutive growth quarter
content: KPIT achieved USD 173 million in revenues, showing constant currency (CC) growth of 20.1% YoY and dollar revenue growth of 19.3% YoY. This growth was primarily driven by the middleware and powertrain domains, with notable contributions from the Asian market and the passenger car vertical.
summary: KPIT achieved USD 173 million in revenues, showing constant currency (CC) growth of 20.1% YoY and dollar revenue growth of 19.3% YoY. This growth was primarily driven by the middleware and powertrain domains, with notable contributions from the Asian market and the passenger car vertical.

title: Qualcomm, Alphabet team up for automotive AI; Mercedes inks chip deal
content: ​​Qualcomm and Google said automakers will be able to use the joint offering and Google's AI technology to create voice assistants that are unique to an automaker and can work without relying on a driver's phone.
summary: ​​Qualcomm and Google said automakers will be able to use the joint offering and Google's AI technology to create voice assistants that are unique to an automaker and can work without relying on a driver's phone.

title: Flying air taxis move closer to US takeoff with issuing of FAA rule
content: The head of the Federal Aviation Administration, Mike Whitaker, said the rule recognises air taxis as an entirely new type of aircraft that will soon join airplanes and helicopters in the sky.
summary: The head of the Federal Aviation Administration, Mike Whitaker, said the rule recognises air taxis as an entirely new type of aircraft that will soon join airplanes and helicopters in the sky.

title: Michelin introduces AI challenge to innovate India's startup ecosystem with AI technologies
content: Michelin has announced the winners of its AI Challenge, held in collaboration with DPIIT and Startup India. The event at IIT Delhi recognised startups for their innovations in AI, offering them mentorship and support. The initiative aims to boost innovation and entrepreneurship in India, with winners gaining funding, global contracts, and incubation support from Michelin leadership.
summary: Michelin has announced the winners of its AI Challenge, held in collaboration with DPIIT and Startup India. The event at IIT Delhi recognised startups for their innovations in AI, offering them mentorship and support. The initiative aims to boost innovation and entrepreneurship in India, with winners gaining funding, global contracts, and incubation support from Michelin leadership.

title: Consumer demand for connectivity and convenience drive auto industry growth, says Continental India CEO
content: Today, buyers’ criteria for selecting a vehicle have shifted from focusing on the engine power to convenience, and smart features. However, investments are needed to grow the connected vehicle segment, and Continental India is working to that extent, Prashanth Doreswamy, president and CEO, Continental India told ETAuto.
summary: Today, buyers’ criteria for selecting a vehicle have shifted from focusing on the engine power to convenience, and smart features. However, investments are needed to grow the connected vehicle segment, and Continental India is working to that extent, Prashanth Doreswamy, president and CEO, Continental India told ETAuto.

title: JSW MG Motor India launches AI chatbots Avira and Vir with Google Cloud for enhanced customer engagement
content: JSW MG Motor India and Google Cloud India have introduced AI chatbots Avira and Vir to boost customer engagement and operational efficiency. Accessible via multiple platforms, these chatbots provide real-time, personalized support, enhancing overall customer satisfaction while promoting innovative tech-first initiatives within the company.
summary: JSW MG Motor India and Google Cloud India have introduced AI chatbots Avira and Vir to boost customer engagement and operational efficiency. Accessible via multiple platforms, these chatbots provide real-time, personalized support, enhancing overall customer satisfaction while promoting innovative tech-first initiatives within the company.

title: Core skills remain crucial in this age of AI and ML
content: The domestic market in India is also seen to present opportunities, with the pre-Covid startup economy taking off and unique challenges in areas such as mobility and the gig economy emerging. As Suresh put it, “The engineering talent required to build solutions for India, in India, is also increasing.”
summary: The domestic market in India is also seen to present opportunities, with the pre-Covid startup economy taking off and unique challenges in areas such as mobility and the gig economy emerging. As Suresh put it, “The engineering talent required to build solutions for India, in India, is also increasing.”

title: IIT Bhubaneswar to offer certificate course on EV Tech
content: The curriculum covers EV design, energy storage, charging networks, supply chains, and sustainability. Delivered through a blend of live sessions, self-paced modules, hands-on labs, and industrial visits, it prepares learners for careers in e-mobility and energy storage, said IIT Bhubaneswar official sources on Friday.
summary: The curriculum covers EV design, energy storage, charging networks, supply chains, and sustainability. Delivered through a blend of live sessions, self-paced modules, hands-on labs, and industrial visits, it prepares learners for careers in e-mobility and energy storage, said IIT Bhubaneswar official sources on Friday.

title: NHTSA probing Tesla's FSD software in 2.4 mn vehicles over collisions
content: The preliminary probe will cover 2.4 million Tesla vehicles, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said, accounting for a big share of the electric automaker's vehicles on U.S. roads.
summary: The preliminary probe will cover 2.4 million Tesla vehicles, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said, accounting for a big share of the electric automaker's vehicles on U.S. roads.

title: Bengaluru airport partners with Sarla Aviation to launch electric flying taxis
content: While operations may still be two to three years away, Sarla Aviation's electric taxis promise a cleaner, quieter, and more cost-effective alternative to traditional helicopter services previously offered in Bengaluru.The Bengaluru-based company, co-founded by Adrian Schmidt, Rakesh Gaonkar and Shivam Chauhan, is at the forefront of this transformation.
summary: While operations may still be two to three years away, Sarla Aviation's electric taxis promise a cleaner, quieter, and more cost-effective alternative to traditional helicopter services previously offered in Bengaluru.The Bengaluru-based company, co-founded by Adrian Schmidt, Rakesh Gaonkar and Shivam Chauhan, is at the forefront of this transformation.

title: Exclusive: Ratan Tata founded EV startup embarks on SDV tech journey, appoints an Ola Electric Director to head new initiative
content: The 7-year old EV powertrain supplier looks to build new competencies as part of its sustainable growth strategy. Builds a new team for developing the SDV tech stack.
summary: The 7-year old EV powertrain supplier looks to build new competencies as part of its sustainable growth strategy. Builds a new team for developing the SDV tech stack.

title: Kia India signs up Bharti Airtel’s enterprise arm to enable connected cars
content: “We are thrilled to power the journey of Kia’s connected cars with our future-ready technology solution that offers efficient and effective capabilities. We are committed to playing a significant role in India’s digital growth with our cutting-edge integrated IoT Hub that offers customised solutions for the unique IoT requirements of enterprises across 5G, 4G, NB-IoT, 2G and satellite,” said Sharat Sinha, CEO ̶ Airtel Business.
summary: “We are thrilled to power the journey of Kia’s connected cars with our future-ready technology solution that offers efficient and effective capabilities. We are committed to playing a significant role in India’s digital growth with our cutting-edge integrated IoT Hub that offers customised solutions for the unique IoT requirements of enterprises across 5G, 4G, NB-IoT, 2G and satellite,” said Sharat Sinha, CEO ̶ Airtel Business.

title: Nitin Gadkari urges automobile industry to promote ethanol, flex fuels
content: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari urged representatives from the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) to explore promoting ethanol and flex fuels in India. During a meeting, the discussion highlighted Brazil's success with flex fuels and how a shift to biofuels can reduce pollution and fossil fuel imports while supporting farmers.
summary: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari urged representatives from the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) to explore promoting ethanol and flex fuels in India. During a meeting, the discussion highlighted Brazil's success with flex fuels and how a shift to biofuels can reduce pollution and fossil fuel imports while supporting farmers.

title: Droom marks 10 years with the launch of AI-powered platform
content: Founded in 2014, Droom has evolved from a start-up to a platform that has supported over 2.5 million customers. Over the past decade, the company has sold more than 580,000 vehicles valued at USD 7.3 billion and facilitated 4.5 million listings. Droom’s network includes 23,000 dealers across 1,176 cities, and it currently attracts 16 million monthly active users with 16.2 million app downloads, the company said in a media release.
summary: Founded in 2014, Droom has evolved from a start-up to a platform that has supported over 2.5 million customers. Over the past decade, the company has sold more than 580,000 vehicles valued at USD 7.3 billion and facilitated 4.5 million listings. Droom’s network includes 23,000 dealers across 1,176 cities, and it currently attracts 16 million monthly active users with 16.2 million app downloads, the company said in a media release.

title: TomTom sees location tech sales at low end of guidance as weak auto demand weighs
content: A slowdown in global auto demand has impacted TomTom, which makes a bulk of its sales from location technology applications for cars. In July, it suspended its 2025 targets and trimmed its revenue expectations for 2024 because of this.
summary: A slowdown in global auto demand has impacted TomTom, which makes a bulk of its sales from location technology applications for cars. In July, it suspended its 2025 targets and trimmed its revenue expectations for 2024 because of this.

title: ‘The Indian tech hub will have global products and deliver global services’
content: In the following interview, BMW Group’s CIO and Sr. VP Alexander Buresch, and Christoph Grote, Sr. VP – Software and E/E architecture, talk to ETAuto’s Editor - Technology Sumantra Bibhuti Barooah about how BMW plans to tap India for technology leadership, the trends of automobile softwarisation, Autonomous Driving,and whether BMW could see its future SDV programmes being developed in India.
summary: In the following interview, BMW Group’s CIO and Sr. VP Alexander Buresch, and Christoph Grote, Sr. VP – Software and E/E architecture, talk to ETAuto’s Editor - Technology Sumantra Bibhuti Barooah about how BMW plans to tap India for technology leadership, the trends of automobile softwarisation, Autonomous Driving,and whether BMW could see its future SDV programmes being developed in India.

title: Tata Elxsi beats Q2 profit estimates driven by transportation segment
content: ​​Analysts had expected 2.05 billion rupees, according to data from LSEG. Revenue from operations rose 8.3% to 9.55 billion rupees, in line with analysts' estimate of 9.56 billion rupees.
summary: ​​Analysts had expected 2.05 billion rupees, according to data from LSEG. Revenue from operations rose 8.3% to 9.55 billion rupees, in line with analysts' estimate of 9.56 billion rupees.

title: Tesla gambles on 'black box' AI tech for robotaxis
content: Convincing regulators and passengers of the vehicle's safety could prove much harder and take much longer - while its main competitors, such as Alphabet's Waymo, expand robotaxi fleets they're already operating in select cities today.
summary: Convincing regulators and passengers of the vehicle's safety could prove much harder and take much longer - while its main competitors, such as Alphabet's Waymo, expand robotaxi fleets they're already operating in select cities today.

title: Maruti Suzuki enhances road safety with automation of 12 driving license test tracks in Uttar Pradesh
content: Maruti Suzuki India Limited has agreed with Uttar Pradesh's Transport Department to automate 12 more driving license test tracks. The automation aims to make the issuance process more scientific, transparent, and efficient, enhancing road safety. Earlier, five tracks were automated successfully. High-definition cameras and an integrated IT system will evaluate applicants comprehensively.
summary: Maruti Suzuki India Limited has agreed with Uttar Pradesh's Transport Department to automate 12 more driving license test tracks. The automation aims to make the issuance process more scientific, transparent, and efficient, enhancing road safety. Earlier, five tracks were automated successfully. High-definition cameras and an integrated IT system will evaluate applicants comprehensively.

title: Readywire equips automotive dealerships with AI-driven ERP solutions for peak season surge
content: Many automotive dealerships face challenges because of manual processes and disconnected systems during peak periods, which can lead to missed inquiries, longer wait times for test drives, and errors in promotional offers, resulting in lost sales and customer dissatisfaction.
summary: Many automotive dealerships face challenges because of manual processes and disconnected systems during peak periods, which can lead to missed inquiries, longer wait times for test drives, and errors in promotional offers, resulting in lost sales and customer dissatisfaction.
